summary: The implementation comprehensively addresses all requirements. The backend includes a complete restaurant data model with all required fields, filtering methods by cuisine/price/rating, and add/get operations. The frontend implements a responsive restaurant listing page with search, filters (cuisine, price, rating), detail view, and a warm, food-focused visual theme. Generated restaurant images are properly mapped by cuisine type. All acceptance criteria appear satisfied based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication integration (useInternetIdentity hook, InternetIdentityProvider, AuthClient usage)
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest makes no mention of user authentication, login, or Internet Identity. The implementation includes a full authentication system with identity management, which was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Query client integration with actor-based identity state management
hallucinated_features.reason: The implementation includes complex query invalidation logic tied to identity changes in useActor.ts. While React Query was required, identity-based query management was not requested.
The BuildRequest did not specify dark mode support. The implementation includes full dark mode color definitions in both index.css files.
